Mega Blaster is a bite-sized shooting gem! -The iPhone App Review

Mega Blaster is a wonderful little cannon-shooter, which allows you to shoot down endless waves of enemy debris, ranging from donuts to bombs and beyond. You can ricochet your shots across the screen, aim for coins and power ups, and generally shoot your heart out in this bite-sized action app.

You may be able to upgrade your mega-blaster, or you may hit a bomb and instantly end the round through tumultuous self-destruction. This sort of feature helps to keep the trigger-happy tendency at bay, and in general helps add to a comprehensive title.

The game is extremely light at 10MB, and has an aesthetically pleasing hubris of simple, yet keen coloration. We love that Mega Blaster Lite allows you to play the game for free with advertisements, especially considering that the full game only costs $0.99 to begin with. In general, this game is a blast, through and through.We love to see download options split up into appropriate avenues, so the Lite download option is a big win in our book.

If you get addicted (which you might), you can download the full app for just a buck and continue the fun without advertisements.

But don't just take our word for it, listen to what the critics have to say...
